description: Account that owns the trashed message (mailbox owner).
System-assigned identifier for the message within the trash folder.
Subject line of the notification or message.
Full text content of the message body.
Code indicating read status; likely unread/read—confirm with SME.
Sender’s account or email identifier recorded on the message.
Primary recipient account(s) for the message; may be delimited.
Carbon-copy recipient account(s); may be empty or delimited.
Blind carbon copy recipient account(s), hidden from other recipients.
Priority level code for the message; likely low/medium/high—confirm mapping.
User or process that created the message record.
Timestamp when the message record was created or received.
User or process that last modified this message record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this message record.
Code for the message’s original folder/source before deletion; confirm mapping with SME.
Original message identifier in its source folder before being trashed; confirm with SME.
